item.title: A man is about to get hit by a train what does he do?
item.dc:creator: @anon95490785
item.description:
@anon95490785 wrote:

He turns on his battery operated laptop with wireless internet. Luckily the train has a high speed WiFi zone inside so he manages to get the internet working and he logs onto moparisthebest.com/smf and posts a farewell message because it seems to be the latest trend.

Alternatively, He makes it so his foot gets chopped off by the train and then he sues city hall.

Read full topic

lol someone who admits to being a chav,
a man is about to get hit by a train what does he do??
he thinks ytf am i about to get hit by a train, a minute ago i was just in the office with bill, and about to go on my lunch break…

this man says: “Thats bullshit… There will be no trains… Look at the clock. Its almost midnight. Trains doesent travel at this hour!!” Then he takes big swallow from his whisky bottle and steps to the tracks. You all know what happend then.
